title.rendered: Bosch Foundation partners for specialised healthcare

content.rendered:
Bosch Foundation partners for specialised healthcare

Bosch Foundation, in partnership with Smile Foundation, is revolutionising access to healthcare with the Smile on Wheels program. This initiative features three mobile health units equipped with telemedicine technology for specialty consultations. Operating in Nasik, Chennai and Jaipur, these units are set to deliver approximately 1,35,000 treatments, aiming to bring quality healthcare directly to underserved communities. The Chennai and Nasik units have recently been inaugurated, marking the start of this impactful healthcare journey.
